name: Tumblr Update Dashboard - Light Blue Basic
description:
Dashboard theme, works with the 2014/10/30 update. Basic light blue.

14/11/12 Fix: Removed weird color blocks under the Xkit classic header blog icons. Removed the fix for Xkit's Scroll Down button since Xkit did so itself.
additional_info: Dashboard theme, works with the 2014/10/30 update. Basic light blue. Tweaks some Xkit additions. v1.7 - Blue background, everywhere! - Transparent header! - Post Speech Bubbles again! - Fixes back to the top button size and overlay with Xkit's scroll to the bottom button For questions, requests and problems, go to my ask box. For more colors and backgrounds, check my Userstyles profile. Note: If you have an old theme with a background color or image you like, you can probably just install this one over the old one and keep the old background.
